Name: Just 15 minutes
About the game: Playing 'Just 15 minutes' you will get into the most impregnable fortress, filled with deadly traps. You will have to help The Boar King to overcome sharp spikes, infernal cannons that will shoot you with balls and sharp saws that do not allow you to make mistakes. Only a brave and confident player will be able to reach the last level and get out of this dungeon! Oh, and you have only 15 minutes! Game Features: Old-school gameplay Nice pixel visuals Steam Achievements support Time Attack + Precision Platformer Great Ozzed Soundtrack
